7. The Babadook (2014) - A chilling tale of grief, loss, and mental illness as a mother and son struggle to cope with the death of her husband/father.
8. It Follows (2014) - A unique and unsettling film about a young woman who is pursued by a supernatural entity that takes on different forms.
9. The Witch (2015) - Set in 17th-century New England, this movie follows a family struggling to survive in the wilderness after their infant disappears.
10. The Descent (2005) - A claustrophobic and intense film about a group of women who become trapped in a cave system and hunted by subterranean creatures.

I hope you find something that interests you in this list! Let me know if you have any other preferences or if you'd like more recommendations.
